events.message: The applicant has submitted the personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses.
Application has been categorised under Personal Loan due to the stated reason of medical bills.
Loan officer John Smith assigned to handle the medical expense personal loan application.
Preliminary review of applicant financial documents and stated purpose for the personal loan completed.
Additional documents requested include recent medical bills and proof of income to verify loan request.
Applicant submitted all requested documents including medical bills and employer income statements.
Credit check processed successfully, showing a stable history with no major delinquencies.
Risk assessment performed, indicating moderate risk due to recent medical expenses but stable income.
Loan offer presented to applicant with terms including interest rate and repayment schedule.
Applicant responded with acceptance of loan offer and agreed to the repayment terms proposed.
Application escalated to senior management for final approval due to loan amount exceeding threshold.
Senior management approved the personal loan enabling funds to be disbursed to the applicant.
Loan amount successfully transferred to applicant's bank account as per agreement.
Follow-up call made to ensure applicant is managing repayments and to address any queries.
The personal loan application case has been successfully closed after all steps completed.
